des:
With Daichi Comfort skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Daichi devices by voiсе. To get started, select the "Enable skill" button in the Alexa App to link your Daichi account and discover your devices.

When using the skill, you need to specify by name which device to use.

Onece you know the name of you device, you can say the following: "Alexa, decrease the Upstairs by 3 degrees"

A list of more example phrases include:
- Alexa, set thermostat to twenty.
- Alexa, set the AC to seventy-five.
- Alexa, make it warmer in here.
- Alexa, make it cooler in here.
- Alexa, what's the temperature in here?
- Alexa, what is the temperature of the house?
- Alexa, set thermostat to automatic.
- Alexa, turn off the heat.
- Alexa, what mode is my thermostat set to?
- Alexa, set the fan speed on the bedroom fan to maximum.
- Alexa, turn up the bedroom fan speed.
- Alexa, what's the bedroom fan speed?
